section.title: Major Changes in Version 0.94
section.note: This is not a complete list of changes, just some of the more important ones. A full list of changes in this release is available.

ul.li: Add support for font auto-detection (easier font configuration). Committed by JM. Thanks to Adrian Cumiskey. See Issue 41831.
Add support for the collapsing-border model in tables. Committed by VH, JM. See Issue 36934.
Add support for named destinations in PDF. Committed by JB.
Added support for UAX#14 type line breaking. Support does not extend across nested fo:inline elements. Committed by MM.
